nhc_headline: ...BERYL BECOMING BETTER ORGANIZED AND FORECAST TO BECOME A  HURRICANE BEFORE LANDFALL... ...PREPARATIONS SHOULD BE RUSHED TO COMPLETION...
summary:
...BERYL BECOMING BETTER ORGANIZED AND FORECAST TO BECOME A  HURRICANE BEFORE LANDFALL... ...PREPARATIONS SHOULD BE RUSHED TO COMPLETION...
 As of 10:00 AM CDT Sun Jul 7
 the center of Beryl was located near 25.9, -95.1
 with movement NW at 10 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 992 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 65 mph.
